scripts.build: npm run build-css; npm run build-js
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist/js; uglifyjs src/js/*.js -o dist/js/prio.js --source-map dist/js/prio.js.map
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path scss src/scss/index.scss   dist/css/prio.css --source-map dist/css/prio.css.map; postcss --use autoprefixer -b '> 0%' -r dist/css/prio.css; cssnano dist/css/prio.css dist/css/prio.css
scripts.build-production: npm run build; npm run build-libs-js; npm run build-libs-css; npm run build-templates; npm run build-other
